00032 #define ENTRY_DATA_SET 0
00033 
00035 #define ENTRY_DATA_GROUP 0
00036 
00038 #define NAME_COLUMN 0
00039 #define ENTRY_COLUMN 1

00041 /*
00042  * Initialize any needed members.
00043  */
00044 CalvinCHPFileUpdater::CalvinCHPFileUpdater() : DataSetUpdater()
00045 {
00046         m_CHPFile = NULL;
00047 }
00048 
00049 /*
00050  * Clean up.
00051  */
00052 CalvinCHPFileUpdater::~CalvinCHPFileUpdater()
00053 {
00054         CloseCHPFile();

00056 
00057 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::Initialize(const char *file)
00058 {
00059     DataSetUpdater::Initialize(file);
00060     dataSetIndexMap.clear();
00061     int nds=(int)dataSetNames[0].size();
00062     int ndt=sizeof(MultiDataDataTypes) / sizeof(MultiDataType);
00063     for (int ids=0; ids<nds; ids++)
00064     {
00065         for (int idt=0; idt<ndt; idt++)
00066         {
00067             if (dataSetNames[0][ids] == MultiDataDataSetNames[idt])
00068             dataSetIndexMap[MultiDataDataTypes[idt]] = ids;
00069         }
00070     }
00071 }
00072 
00073 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::OpenCHPFile(const char *fileName)
00074 {
00075         CloseCHPFile();
00076         Initialize(fileName);
00077         m_CHPFile = new ofstream(fileName, ios::out | ios::in | ios::binary);
00078         if (!m_CHPFile) { Err::errAbort("CalvinCHPFileUpdater::OpenCHPFile() - Unable to open CHP file for updating: " + ToStr(fileName)); }
00079 }
00080 
00081 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateExpressionQuantification(int row, float quantification)
00082 {
00083         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, ENTRY_DATA_SET, row, ENTRY_COLUMN);
00084         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, quantification);
00085 }
00086 
00087 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateExpressionQuantificationBuffer(int row_start, std::vector<float> &expressionSignalBuffer)
00088 {
00089         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00090         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, ENTRY_DATA_SET, row_start, NAME_COLUMN);
00091         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[ENTRY_DATA_GROUP][ENTRY_DATA_SET][NAME_COLUMN];
00092         for (int i=0; i<(int)expressionSignalBuffer.size(); i++) 
00093         {
00094                 m_CHPFile->seekp(iProbeSetNameColumnSize, std::ios::cur);
00095                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, expressionSignalBuffer[i]);
00096         }
00097 }
00098 
00099 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateGenotypeEntry(int row, u_int8_t call, float confidence, float RAS1, float RAS2, float aaCall, float abCall, float bbCall, float noCall)
00100 {
00101         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, ENTRY_DATA_SET, row, ENTRY_COLUMN);
00102         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, call);
00103         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, confidence);
00104         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, RAS1);
00105         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, RAS2);
00106         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, aaCall);
00107         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, abCall);
00108         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, bbCall);
00109         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, noCall);
00110 }

00112 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateGenotypeEntryBuffer(int row_start, const std::vector<CHPFileBufferWriter::GenotypeBufferEntry> &genotypeEntryBuffer)
00113 {
00114         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00115         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, ENTRY_DATA_SET, row_start, NAME_COLUMN);
00116         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[ENTRY_DATA_GROUP][ENTRY_DATA_SET][NAME_COLUMN];
00117         for (int i=0; i<(int)genotypeEntryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00118         {
00119                 m_CHPFile->seekp(iProbeSetNameColumnSize, std::ios::cur);
00120                 FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].call);
00121                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].confidence);
00122                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].RAS1);
00123                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].RAS2);
00124                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].aaCall);
00125                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].abCall);
00126                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].bbCall);
00127                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].noCall);
00128         }
00129 }

00131 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateMultiDataGenotypeEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int row, const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData &entry)
00132 {
00133     int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00134         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, dsIndex, row, ENTRY_COLUMN);
00135         FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, entry.call);
00136         FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, entry.confidence);
00137     UpdateMetrics(entry.metrics);
00138 }

00140 static int GetMetricBufferSize(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics)
00141 {
00142     int bufferSize = 0;
00143         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00144         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00145         {
00146                 const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00147                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00148                 {
00149                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00150                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt8());
00151                                 break;
00152 
00153                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00154                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt8());
00155                                 break;
00156 
00157                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00158                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt16());
00159                                 break;
00160 
00161                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00162                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt16());
00163                                 break;
00164 
00165                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00166                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt32());
00167                                 break;
00168 
00169                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00170                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt32());
00171                                 break;
00172 
00173                         case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00174                                 bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueFloat());
00175                                 break;
00176 
00177                         case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00178                 bufferSize += sizeof(int);
00179                                 bufferSize += (int)(nv.GetValueAscii().length() * sizeof(char));
00180                                 break;
00181 
00182                         case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00183                 bufferSize += sizeof(int);
00184                                 bufferSize += (int)(nv.GetValueText().length() * sizeof(wchar_t));
00185                                 break;
00186             
00187             case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
00188                 break;
00189                 }
00190         }
00191     return bufferSize;
00192 }
00193 
00194 static void CopyMetricToBuffer(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics, char * &pbuffer)
00195 {
00196         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00197         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00198         {
00199                 const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00200                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00201                 {
00202                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00203                                 *pbuffer = nv.GetValueInt8();
00204                 pbuffer += sizeof(int8_t);
00205                                 break;
00206 
00207                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00208                                 *pbuffer = nv.GetValueUInt8();
00209                 pbuffer += sizeof(u_int8_t);
00210                                 break;
00211 
00212                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00213                                 MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueInt16());
00214                 pbuffer += sizeof(int16_t);
00215                                 break;
00216 
00217                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00218                                 MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueUInt16());
00219                 pbuffer += sizeof(u_int16_t);
00220                                 break;
00221 
00222                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00223                                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueInt32());
00224                 pbuffer += sizeof(int32_t);
00225                                 break;
00226 
00227                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00228                                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueUInt32());
00229                 pbuffer += sizeof(u_int32_t);
00230                                 break;
00231 
00232                         case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00233                                 MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueFloat());
00234                 pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00235                                 break;
00236 
00237                         case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00238                         case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00239             case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
00240                 break;
00241                 }
00242         }
00243 }
00244 
00245 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateMultiDataGenotypeEntryBuffer(MultiDataType dataType, int row_start, const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData> &genotypeEntryBuffer)
00246 {
00247     if (genotypeEntryBuffer.size() == 0)
00248         return;
00249 
00250         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00251     int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00252         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, dsIndex, row_start, NAME_COLUMN);
00253 
00254     // Create a buffer for writing.
00255         int iProbeSetNameColumnSize = colsizes[ENTRY_DATA_GROUP][ENTRY_DATA_SET][NAME_COLUMN];
00256     int len = iProbeSetNameColumnSize - sizeof(int);
00257     int bufferSize = iProbeSetNameColumnSize + sizeof(genotypeEntryBuffer[0].call) + sizeof(genotypeEntryBuffer[0].confidence) + GetMetricBufferSize(genotypeEntryBuffer[0].metrics);
00258     bufferSize *= (int)genotypeEntryBuffer.size();
00259     char *buffer = new char[bufferSize];
00260     memset(buffer, 0, bufferSize);
00261 
00262     // Copy the data to the buffer
00263     char *pbuffer = buffer;
00264     for (int i=0; i<(int)genotypeEntryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00265     {
00266         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, len);
00267         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00268         memcpy(pbuffer, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].name.c_str(), genotypeEntryBuffer[i].name.length());
00269         pbuffer += len;
00270         *pbuffer = genotypeEntryBuffer[i].call;
00271         pbuffer += sizeof(char);
00272         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, genotypeEntryBuffer[i].confidence);
00273         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00274         CopyMetricToBuffer(genotypeEntryBuffer[i].metrics, pbuffer);
00275     }
00276 
00277     // Write the buffer.
00278     m_CHPFile->write(buffer, bufferSize);
00279     delete[] buffer;
00280     buffer = NULL;
00281 }
00282 
00283 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateMultiDataGenotypeEntryBuffer(MultiDataType dataType, int row_start, int bufferEntrySize, const std::vector<char *> &genotypeEntryBuffer)
00284 {
00285     if (genotypeEntryBuffer.size() == 0)
00286         return;
00287 
00288     // Copy the data to the buffer
00289     int bufferSize = bufferEntrySize * (int)genotypeEntryBuffer.size();
00290     char *buffer = new char[bufferSize];
00291     memset(buffer, 0, bufferSize);
00292     char *pbuffer = buffer;
00293     for (int i=0; i<(int)genotypeEntryBuffer.size(); i++) 
00294     {
00295         memcpy(pbuffer, genotypeEntryBuffer[i], bufferEntrySize);
00296         pbuffer += bufferEntrySize;
00297     }
00298 
00299         // seek to start of update row (note NAME_COLUMN is 0)
00300     int dsIndex = dataSetIndexMap[dataType];
00301         SeekToPosition(*m_CHPFile, ENTRY_DATA_GROUP, dsIndex, row_start, NAME_COLUMN);
00302 
00303     // Write the buffer.
00304     m_CHPFile->write(buffer, bufferSize);
00305     delete[] buffer;
00306     buffer = NULL;
00307 }

00409 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::UpdateMetrics(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics)
00410 {
00411         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00412         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00413         {
00414         const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00415                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00416                 {
00417                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00418                 FileOutput::WriteInt8(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueInt8());
00419                                 break;
00420 
00421                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00422                                 FileOutput::WriteUInt8(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueUInt8());
00423                                 break;
00424 
00425                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00426                                 FileOutput::WriteInt16(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueInt16());
00427                                 break;
00428 
00429                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00430                                 FileOutput::WriteUInt16(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueUInt16());
00431                                 break;
00432 
00433                         case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00434                                 FileOutput::WriteInt32(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueInt32());
00435                                 break;
00436 
00437                         case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00438                                 FileOutput::WriteUInt32(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueUInt32());
00439                                 break;
00440 
00441                         case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00442                                 FileOutput::WriteFloat(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueFloat());
00443                                 break;
00444 
00445                         case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00446                                 FileOutput::WriteString8(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueAscii());
00447                                 break;
00448 
00449                         case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00450                 FileOutput::WriteString16(*m_CHPFile, nv.GetValueText());
00451                                 break;
00452         // @todo Check that this is ok.
00453     case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
00454       break;
00455                 }
00456         }
00457 }
00458 
00459 void CalvinCHPFileUpdater::CloseCHPFile()
00460 {
00461         if (m_CHPFile != NULL)
00462         {
00463                 if (m_CHPFile->is_open() == true) { m_CHPFile->close(); }
00464                 delete m_CHPFile;
00465                 m_CHPFile = NULL;
00466         }
00467 }
